templates.title: Pihole
templates.description: A black hole for Internet advertisements with DNS servered with DNS-over-TLS by Cloudflared.

env.name: PROXY_NAME
env.label: Proxy
env.description: The name of the docker bridge that your reverse proxy is running on.

env.name: PROXY_DOMAIN
env.label: Proxy Domain
env.description: The root domain that your reverse proxy is serving.

env.name: PIHOLE_WEBPASSWORD
env.label: Web Password
env.description: The password for the pihole web interface.

env.name: PIHOLE_INTERFACE
env.label: Network Interface
env.description: The network interface that pihole will listen on.

env.name: PIHOLE_LAN_DOMAIN
env.label: LAN Domain
env.description: The domain of your LAN. (e.g. example.com)

env.name: PIHOLE_LAN_ADDRESS_IPv4
env.label: LAN IPv4 Address
env.description: The IPv4 address of your LAN. (e.g. 10.0.0.6)

env.name: PIHOLE_LAN_ADDRESS_IPv6
env.label: LAN IPv6 Address
env.description: The IPv6 address of your LAN. (e.g. fd00::6)
